title: Monitoring Serum Potassium Concentration in Patients with Severe Hyperkalemia: The Role of Bloodless Artificial Intelligence-Enabled Electrocardiography
details: CC Chen, C Lin, DJ Lee, CS Lin, SJ Chen, CC Sung… - Clinical Kidney Journal, 2025
abstract: Background Severe hyperkalemia is a life-threatening emergency requiring prompt management and close surveillance. Although artificial intelligence-enabled electrocardiography (AI-ECG) has been developed to rapidly detect hyperkalemia, its …

title: Configuration of QRS complexes in 12-lead electrocardiogram in dogs with monomorphic ventricular tachycardias or complete bundle branch block
details: M Perego, A Maffei, D Cavallini, R Santilli - Frontiers in Veterinary Science
abstract: The differentiation between ventricular tachycardias (VT) and supraventricular tachycardias (SVT) with bundle branch block (BBB) is clinically challenging. The aim of the study was to define by the 12-lead-electrocardiogram the QRS complex …
